title: Create a Secret named 'my-secret' of type 'kubernetes.io/ssh-auth' in the namespace 'secret-ops'. Define a single key named 'ssh-privatekey', and point it to the file 'id_rsa' in this directory.
description: Create a Secret named 'my-secret' of type 'kubernetes.io/ssh-auth' in the namespace 'secret-ops'. Define a single key named 'ssh-privatekey', and point it to the file 'id_rsa' in this directory.

steps: 4. k create secret generic my-secret $ns --type="kubernetes.io/ssh-auth" --from-file=ssh-privatekey=id_rsa $do > sc.yaml
